function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on reducing adverse environmental impacts in building design","Impact":"Increased environmental harm and resource depletion","Mitigation":"Implement regenerative design approaches and prioritize environmental impact assessments","Technologies":"Green building design, regenerative design technologies","People":"Architects, designers, urban planners","Owner":"Architects, designers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Standardization leading to homogenized human experience and expectation","Impact":"Loss of complexity, diversity, and resilience in the built environment","Mitigation":"Promote diversity in design and consider socio-ecological systems in urban planning","Technologies":"Regenerative design technologies, diversity-focused design approaches","People":"Urban planners, architects, designers","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, designers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for the impact of building design on contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Incorporate disease-resistant design features and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Disease-resistant materials, ventilation systems, touchless technology","People":"Building occupants, public health officials","Owner":"Architects, building owners, public health officials"}]}
